title: Single & living it up before settling down
text:
Whatever happens stays with the ones who have attended the singles outing. That's the thumb rule of stag dos and hen nights. Also called Bachelor or Bachelorette parties, this is a growing urban trend with single men and women who are about to tie the knot.
Some call it an intrusive western influence but then who's complaining as long as the fun intended brings friends closer at a getaway that promises to relax their nerves and induce some rejuvenation. The entire purpose of a stag or hen do is to celebrate the single person's last night of freedom before being tied down in marriage.
Women go for Hen Nights where the Maid of Honour organises the Bachelorette do. The best man (in all-mens group) takes the lead to organise a party with the groom being the centre of attention.
The themes often vary from being debauched to sporty or even spiritual to adventure-packed. In India, girls and boys have started to prefer a sporty day out, say quad biking or trekking whilst some prefer a semi debauched night out with cocktails, dancers and lots of freaky new-age gimmicky games.

BEACH BABES 
Region : Palolem, Agonda, Colva & Varkala, Bekal, Kovalam
At the Hen parties, friends remember great times spent together and add a dash of adventure with some late night partying sessions. Goa and Kerala beaches bring out some local fun and partying with an element of rejuvenation.
Goa : During the day, bask in the soothing Indian sun on one of Goa fs pristine beaches. Get the party started early with kaju fenni, a local liquor made from the fruits of cashew trees. By night, party till the hot sun comes back up at one of the many nightclubs or secret raves for which this former Portuguese colony is known. Find techno music, open-air dance floors and delicious seafood on Baga Beach. For those who seek comfort in idyllic settings, then the beaches of South Goa including Palolem, Agonda and Colva are the perfect places to visit with your friends for a bachelorette vacay
Kerala : The state has beautiful beaches such as Varkala, Marari, Bekal, Kovalam and Kappad. Home to tranquil surroundings, pure environment and healing Ayurvedic treatments, plan a getaway with your friends to Kerala to get that egolden glow. f singles fun. Let's go!
WOW! FACTOR 
Take an hour long sunset cruise at Mandovi River. While the boat sails down the river, the locals perform folk dances and sing songs.
